paper_abstract: We present a Matlab program that computes infinite range integrals of an arbitrary product of Bessel functions of the first kind. The algorithm uses an integral representation of the upper incomplete Gamma function to integrate the tail of the integrand. This paper describes the algorithm and then focuses on some implementation aspects of the Matlab program. Finally we mention a generalisation that incorporates the Laplace transform of a product of Bessel functions.
paper_title: A Matlab implementation of an algorithm for computing integrals of products of Bessel functions
